unnormalised: Social media is buzzing, folks! Brand collaborations are the new black in influencer marketing. Think your favorite dosa spot teaming up with a trendy saree brand for a quirky Onam campaign? Yeah, that's the vibe!
normalised: Social media is buzzing, folks! Brand collaborations are the new black in influencer marketing. Think your favorite dosa spot teaming up with a trendy saree brand for a quirky Onam campaign? Yeah, that's the vibe!

unnormalised: We're seeing everyone from Chennai-based tech startups partnering with Instagram food bloggers to Delhi University societies collaborating with local streetwear brands. Even your local chaiwala might be dropping a limited-edition 'collab' with a meme page soon – watch out!
normalised: We're seeing everyone from Chennai-based tech startups partnering with Instagram food bloggers to Delhi University societies collaborating with local streetwear brands. Even your local chaiwala might be dropping a limited-edition 'collab' with a meme page soon – watch out!

unnormalised: Brands are finally realizing that reaching Gen Z isn't just about flashy ads, it's about authentic connections. And what better way to connect than through relatable influencers and creative partnerships? Imagine, a biryani brand partnering with a travel vlogger exploring Lucknow!
normalised: Brands are finally realizing that reaching Gen Z isn't just about flashy ads, it's about authentic connections. And what better way to connect than through relatable influencers and creative partnerships? Imagine, a biryani brand partnering with a travel vlogger exploring Lucknow!

unnormalised: Experts predict this trend will only accelerate, with more micro-influencers and hyperlocal brands joining the collab party. Get ready for a whole lotta "tagging spree" ahead! Keep your eyes peeled for innovative campaigns launching right before Diwali! Expect discounts ranging from 10% - 50% for the upcoming campaigns!
normalised: Experts predict this trend will only accelerate, with more micro-influencers and hyperlocal brands joining the collab party. Get ready for a whole lot of "tagging spree" ahead! Keep your eyes peeled for innovative campaigns launching right before Diwali! Expect discounts ranging from ten percent to fifty percent for the upcoming campaigns!
